product.title: HerStyler Colorful Seasons Flat Iron, Ocean Blue
product.description: The HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron.
product.description_html: The HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron.
product.description_full:
The HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron. HerStyler Colorful Seasons Flat Iron, Ocean Blue Product Features: 
 * Solid 1.25" ceramic plates allows you to straighten, flip and curl hair for long-lasting results
 * Heats up to 460°F to accommodate all hair types
 * Floating plate technology allows flexible movements of the plates along the central axis
 * 360° professional-length swivel cord prevents the cord from getting tangled or damaged
 * Temperature control setting suitable for all hair types
 * Ceramic plates emit negative ion technology to eliminate frizz
 * Infrared technology heats hair from the inside out, distributing heat evenly causing less damage to the surface
 * Dual voltage accepts both 110-120V and 220-240V
product.description_full_html:
The HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron is the ultimate fashion accessory. Get your hair silky smooth in minutes! With 100% ceramic floating plates, the HerStyler Colorful Seasons flat iron generates 6x more negative ions than a regular flat iron.
HerStyler Colorful Seasons Flat Iron, Ocean Blue Product Features:
  • Solid 1.25" ceramic plates allows you to straighten, flip and curl hair for long-lasting results 
  • Heats up to 460°F to accommodate all hair types 
  • Floating plate technology allows flexible movements of the plates along the central axis 
  • 360° professional-length swivel cord prevents the cord from getting tangled or damaged 
  • Temperature control setting suitable for all hair types 
  • Ceramic plates emit negative ion technology to eliminate frizz 
  • Infrared technology heats hair from the inside out, distributing heat evenly causing less damage to the surface 
  • Dual voltage accepts both 110-120V and 220-240V

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
